name: J Riley Harrington
description: Riley has been a full stack developer for multiple start-ups in many different industries. He's always kept videogames and videogame development as a passion throughout his life. Eventually it just became an obvious next step to merge those threads of his life and start his own pretend game company.

name: Could Be You
description: Looking for help and I have more than enough game ideas to go around. So if you have a passion and want to pour yourself into something with very little promise of monetary gain, drop me a line!
